About
===================================== 

Row 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Descriptions

An automated dashboard which daily updates the corona virus cases. 

<br>

The dashboard is made by:

<li>R / RStudio - language and IDE</li>
<li>Flexdashboard - dashboard tool</li> 
<li>Leaflet - mapping</li> 
<li>Highcharters - charts library</li>

<br>

Author: <a href="http://linkedin.com/in/bjungbogati">Binod Jung Bogati</a>, <a href="http://twitter.com/bjungbogati">@bjungbogati</a>

<a href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/numericmind/">Numeric Mind</a>, <a href="http://twitter.com/numericmind">@numericmind</a>
